seller_research.name: Whatfix
seller_research.description: Whatfix is an Indian SaaS-based digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.
products: Simulated application environments for hands-on training

pricing_models.description: Pricing based on the needs and scale of each organization, including a combination of a flat fee and user license fees.
A free plan with 30 credits, ideal for small-scale businesses.
A basic plan starting at $39 per month, ideal for startups.
A professional plan starting at $389 per month, ideal for growing businesses.

buyer_research.description: Mercedes-Benz is a German multinational automotive corporation that designs, manufactures, and sells luxury vehicles, buses, coaches, and trucks.
challenges: Increasing competition in the automotive market
Shifting towards electric and autonomous vehicles
Meeting regulatory requirements and emissions standards

What kind of flexibility does Whatfix offer in terms of customization and tailoring the platform to our specific needs?

messages.content: Hello, thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. I'm excited to learn more about Mercedes Benz's goals and challenges. Can you please introduce yourself and tell me a little bit about your role and what you're hoping to achieve from our conversation today?

Hi, I'm Hans, and I'm the Head of Digital Transformation at Mercedes Benz. I'm responsible for driving digital innovation and improving customer experience across our organization. We're facing increasing competition in the automotive market, and we're looking for ways to stay ahead of the curve. We're interested in learning more about Whatfix's digital adoption platform and how it can help us accelerate our digital transformation journey.

Thank you for sharing that, Hans. I'd love to learn more about your current challenges and pain points. What are some of the specific issues you're facing in terms of digital transformation, and how do you think Whatfix's platform can help address those challenges?

One of our biggest challenges is getting our employees to adopt new digital tools and systems. We've invested heavily in technology, but we're not seeing the returns we expected. We're also struggling to provide a seamless customer experience across all our touchpoints. We think Whatfix's platform could help us address these issues, but we need to understand how it works and what kind of ROI we can expect.

I completely understand. User adoption is a critical issue for many organizations. Whatfix's platform is designed to provide personalized guidance and support to users, helping them to adopt new systems and tools quickly and efficiently. Our platform can also help you to provide a more seamless customer experience by streamlining processes and reducing friction. Can you tell me a little bit more about your current customer experience strategy and how you're measuring success?

We're currently using a combination of manual processes and existing systems to provide customer support, but it's not very efficient. We're looking for ways to automate and streamline our processes to reduce costs and improve customer satisfaction. We're also interested in using data and analytics to better understand our customers and provide more personalized experiences. How does Whatfix's platform integrate with existing systems and tools, and can it help us to achieve our customer experience goals?

Whatfix's platform is designed to integrate seamlessly with existing systems and tools, so we can work with your current technology stack to provide a customized solution. Our platform also includes advanced analytics and reporting capabilities, which can help you to track user behavior, identify areas for improvement, and measure the success of your customer experience initiatives. Can you tell me a little bit more about your existing technology stack and what kind of integrations you would need?

We're currently using a combination of SAP, Salesforce, and custom-built applications. We're also using a number of different tools and systems to provide customer support and manage our supply chain. We're looking for a platform that can integrate with all of these systems and provide a single, unified view of our customer data.

I understand. Whatfix's platform can integrate with all of these systems and provide a single, unified view of your customer data. We've worked with a number of large enterprises to provide customized integrations and solutions. Can you tell me a little bit more about your decision-making process and timeline for implementing a new digital adoption platform? Are there any other stakeholders or team members who would need to be involved in the decision-making process?

Our decision-making process typically involves a cross-functional team of stakeholders, including our CEO, Board of Management, and other senior leaders. We're looking to implement a new digital adoption platform within the next 6-12 months, and we're currently evaluating a number of different vendors and solutions. What kind of implementation timelines and resource requirements can we expect from Whatfix's platform?

Whatfix's platform can be implemented quickly and efficiently, with most implementations taking place within 2-4 weeks. We also provide a range of resources and support to ensure a smooth transition, including dedicated customer success managers, training and support teams, and a comprehensive knowledge base. We can also provide a customized implementation plan and timeline based on your specific needs and requirements.
That sounds great. Can you provide some case studies or examples of other companies in the automotive industry who have implemented Whatfix's platform and seen success?

Yes, of course. We've worked with a number of companies in the automotive industry, including Ford and General Motors. We can provide you with some case studies and examples of how our platform has helped these companies to accelerate their digital transformation journeys and improve customer experience.

features.name: Digital Adoption Platform
features.description: A platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

features.name: In-app guidance
features.description: A feature that provides step-by-step guidance to users within the application to help them adopt new systems and tools quickly and efficiently.

features.name: Analytics
features.description: A feature that helps track user behavior, identify areas for improvement, and measure the success of customer experience initiatives.

features.name: Mirror
features.description: A feature that provides simulated application environments for hands-on training.

features.name: No-code editor
features.description: A feature that allows users to create and edit content without requiring any coding skills.

features.name: Contextual user experiences
features.description: A feature that provides personalized guidance and support to users based on their role, location, and other factors.

features.name: Step-by-step guidance
features.description: A feature that breaks down complex tasks into simple, easy-to-follow steps to help users complete tasks efficiently.

features.name: Self-help user support
features.description: A feature that provides users with instant support and guidance within the application to help them resolve issues quickly.

features.name: On-demand user support
features.description: A feature that provides users with access to support resources and guidance on-demand to help them resolve issues quickly.

features.name: Customer contextual messages
features.description: A feature that provides users with personalized messages and guidance based on their behavior and interactions within the application.

messages.content: Hello everyone, thank you for taking the time to join today's demo call. I'm excited to show you how Whatfix's digital adoption platform can help Mercedes Benz improve customer satisfaction, reduce costs, and provide a more seamless customer experience. Before we dive in, I just want to confirm that we have all the stakeholders on the call today, including the CEO, Board of Management, and other senior leaders. Is that correct?
Yes, that's correct. We're all here and excited to learn more about Whatfix's platform.

Great! Let's get started then. Our platform is designed to provide personalized guidance and support to users, helping them to adopt new systems and tools quickly and efficiently. One of the key features we'll be demonstrating today is our in-app guidance feature. This feature provides step-by-step guidance to users within the application, helping them to complete tasks efficiently and effectively.
That sounds interesting. Can you show us how that works?

Absolutely. Let me just share my screen real quick. (shares screen) Okay, so let's say we have a user who needs to complete a task within our application. Our in-app guidance feature will provide them with step-by-step instructions, making it easy for them to complete the task. (demonstrates in-app guidance feature)
I see. That's really cool. How does Whatfix's platform integrate with our existing systems and tools?

Our platform is designed to integrate seamlessly with existing systems and tools. We've worked with many companies in the automotive industry, and we're confident that we can work with your current technology stack to provide a customized solution. For example, we've worked with a company similar to yours to integrate our platform with their CRM system, allowing them to provide personalized support to their customers.
I'm not sure I understand how Whatfix's platform can help us to track user behavior and identify areas for improvement. Can you explain that a bit more?

Absolutely. Our analytics feature provides real-time insights into user behavior, allowing you to identify areas for improvement and measure the success of your customer experience initiatives. For example, let's say you want to know how users are interacting with your application. Our analytics feature will provide you with real-time data on user behavior, helping you to identify areas where users may be getting stuck or struggling. (demonstrates analytics feature)
That's really impressive. How do you handle customization and personalization for our specific needs?

We offer a high degree of customization and personalization for our clients. We understand that every company is unique, and we work closely with our clients to understand their specific needs and requirements. For example, we can customize our platform to provide personalized guidance and support to users based on their role, location, and other factors. We can also work with you to develop custom content and integrations that meet your specific needs.
I see. What kind of ROI can we expect from implementing Whatfix's platform?

We've seen our clients achieve significant ROI from implementing our platform. For example, one of our clients in the automotive industry saw a 30% reduction in support costs and a 25% increase in customer satisfaction after implementing our platform. We can provide you with a custom ROI analysis based on your specific needs and requirements.

Before we wrap up, I just want to make sure that we've covered all of your questions and concerns today. Do you have any other questions or would you like to see any additional features or functionality?
No, I think that covers everything. Thank you for the demo today!

You're welcome! We're excited about the potential opportunity to work with Mercedes Benz and help you to achieve your customer experience goals. We'll follow up with you next week to discuss next steps and answer any additional questions you may have. Is that sounds good to you?
